EmailTemplate.name: Foreign Currency
EmailTemplate.subject: ICCU Foreign Currency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. Unfortunately, we currently do not offer any foreign currency in our branches. We typically recommend going to a bank in the area, such as Key Bank, Wells Fargo, etc. since they are more likely to have foreign currency available.
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. We appreciate your membership. Have a wonderful day, {!Case.Contact}
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
